name: EVA
text:
Hello.
I’m EVA.
Expert Vulnerability Assistant.

name: EVA
text: Unlike firewalls and passwords, social engineering targets people — not systems.

name: EVA
text:
Attackers will sound helpful, urgent, friendly, or authoritative.
Sometimes all at once.

name: EVA
text:
They rarely ask for passwords directly.
Instead, they collect small pieces of information.

name: EVA
text: Your task is simple — but not easy.

name: EVA
text:
Stay calm.
Question intent.
Verify through trusted channels.
